arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner wants another ‘great story’ against Brighton
arts.sum: “At home, of course, the game story, conceding two red cards and getting the win at the end was great. The team will want to extend their unbeaten record at Selhurst Park to 14 fixtures in the Premier League and claim the bragging rights again after an explosive 2-1 victory over their rivals in April that involved three red cards at their ground.
